description: Task is the Schema for the Task API.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: TaskSpec defines the desired state of Task.

connection.description: Connection represents the Machine connectivity information.

authSecretRef.description: AuthSecretRef is the SecretReference that contains authentication information of the Machine. The Secret must contain username and password keys.

name.description: name is unique within a namespace to reference a secret resource.

namespace.description: namespace defines the space within which the secret name must be unique.

host.description: Host is the host IP address or hostname of the Machine.

port.description: Port is the port number for connecting with the Machine.

task.description: Task defines the specific action to be performed.

oneTimeBootDeviceAction.description: OneTimeBootDeviceAction represents a baseboard management one time set boot device operation.

device.description: Devices represents the boot devices, in order for setting one time boot. Currently only the first device in the slice is used to set one time boot.

items.description: BootDevice represents boot device of the Machine.

efiBoot.description: EFIBoot instructs the machine to use EFI boot.

powerAction.description: PowerAction represents a baseboard management power operation.

virtualMediaAction.description: VirtualMediaAction represents a baseboard management virtual media insert/eject.

mediaURL.description: mediaURL represents the URL of the image to be inserted into the virtual media, or empty to eject media.

status.description: TaskStatus defines the observed state of Task

completionTime.description: CompletionTime represents time when the task was completed. The completion time is only set when the task finishes successfully.

conditions.description: Conditions represents the latest available observations of an object's current state.

message.description: Message represents human readable message indicating details about last transition.

status.description: Status is the status of the Task condition. Can be True or False.

startTime.description: StartTime represents time when the Task started processing.
